name: Argent: Hidden Crown
description:
You are Lucille, a servant from the House of Fyor. After receiving the legendary transforming weapon, the Argent, from your mentor, you set off on your quest to destroy the mysterious clockwork machinery in the central harbor. Destroy the assailants as you attempt to uncover a dark secret, one that will send the whole continent into chaos.

Argent: Hidden Crown is a 3D action RPG developed at UMN VGDC during the 2022 spring semester. Explore the world, open chests, equip upgrades, and hack and slash through your enemies to reach the final boss!

Programming:

  • Simone Angelo Toribio
  • Thomas Yun
  • Jonathan Meshesha
  • Trevor Skupien

Art & Design

  • Andrew Cao
  • Crystal Wen

Music by Goukisan: https://goukisan.newgrounds.com/
